content:
A group of military personnel of the Russian Federation was destroyed by SCO snipers during night work.

About thisreported March 18Forces of special operations of the Armed Forces.

Combat work continued in the Kherson direction, where while observing enemy positions, our soldiers noticed movement from the enemy and immediately opened fire.

Special surgery forces were destroyed by six enemy servicemen.

AsThe ArmyInform reported earlier, in Kherson region, SCO soldiers prevented the attempts by the Russians to replace reservoirs.
title: Ukrainian snipers stuck 6 Russians
description: This was reported on March 18 by the forces of special operations of the Armed Forces. The combat work lasted ...
author: Army Inform
